Topic.Title: Can you combine two text games of yours?

Posts.EditableText: Can I combine two text games I have into 1? If not, is there a way around it? I [i:9zw3ff38]need[/i:9zw3ff38] to combine these two text games into a single text game. Could I copy the pages? Or anything?
